messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unidentified lifesigns detected coming aboard Space Station 13. Secure any exterior access, including ducting and ventilation.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Please have a productive, and safe shift, crew, it would break my big bearded heart if you went and died. I also hope that, in the event of the unforeseen, you have signed your waivers.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed [REDACTED] level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a horde of wire eating mammals have descended into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Should we make a crew transfer? Things seem a little slow, and...no one's coordinated enough to make the station goal a reality.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Experimentation Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Machine Learning Alert

Rampant brand intelligence has been detected aboard Space Station 13. Please stand by. The origin is believed to be ChapDrobe.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
